title: Regal
description: In the fields of heaven are sown the seeds of stars, and some go astray. Going in search of solace and something to give his life meaning, Sinjin Volker finds wonders he would never have imagined and dangers from his deepest fears. Armed with only artifacts he's powerless to use, Sinjin must change the world by first changing himself.The World of Godsland Young Adult Epic Fantasy Series The Dawning of Power trilogy (Bundle available) Call of the Herald Inherited Danger Dragon Ore The Balance of Power trilogy (Bundle available) Regent Feral Regal The Artifacts of Power trilogy (Bundle available) The Fifth Magic Dragonhold The Seventh Magic
author: Brian Rathbone
